comments: Shared transliteration tests. In each test, the dev field is compulsory.
TODO: Add tests for ॐ, handling of .Da in kannada.
various fraction symbols in various scripts

devanaagarii_round_trip.description: A general test. Checks punctuations, OM.
devanaagarii_round_trip.dev: असय औषधिः ग्रन्थः! ॡकारो नास्ति लेशोऽपि संशयः। कीलकम्? कूपिः?  कष्ठं भोः। शङ्कर! ज्ञानम्।  सञ्जीवय। १२३४५॥ ॐ तत्।
devanaagarii_round_trip.iast: asaya auṣadhiḥ granthaḥ! ḹkāro nāsti leśo'pi saṃśayaḥ. kīlakam? kūpiḥ?  kaṣṭhaṃ bhoḥ. śaṅkara! jñānam.  sañjīvaya. 12345.. oṃ tat.
devanaagarii_round_trip.iastDcs: asaya auṣadhiḥ granthaḥ! ḹkāro nāsti leśo'pi saṃśayaḥ/ kīlakam? kūpiḥ?  kaṣṭhaṃ bhoḥ/ śaṅkara! jñānam/  sañjīvaya/ 12345// aum tat/
devanaagarii_round_trip.hk: asaya auSadhiH granthaH! lRRkAro nAsti lezo'pi saMzayaH| kIlakam? kUpiH?  kaSThaM bhoH| zaGkara! jJAnam|  saJjIvaya| 12345|| OM tat|
devanaagarii_round_trip.optitrans: asaya auShadhiH granthaH! LLIkaaro naasti lesho.api saMshayaH. kiilakam? kuupiH?  kaShThaM bhoH. shankara! jnaanam.  sanjiivaya. 12345.. OM tat.
devanaagarii_round_trip.slp: asaya OzaDiH granTaH! XkAro nAsti leSo'pi saMSayaH. kIlakam? kUpiH?  kazWaM BoH. SaNkara! jYAnam.  saYjIvaya. 12345.. AUM tat.
devanaagarii_round_trip.wx: asaya ORaXiH granWaH! ḹkAro nAswi leSo'pi saMSayaH. kIlakam? kUpiH?  kaRTaM BoH. Safkara! jFAnam.  saFjIvaya. 12345.. oM waw.
devanaagarii_round_trip.kannada: ಅಸಯ ಔಷಧಿಃ ಗ್ರನ್ಥಃ! ೡಕಾರೋ ನಾಸ್ತಿ ಲೇಶೋಽಪಿ ಸಂಶಯಃ। ಕೀಲಕಮ್? ಕೂಪಿಃ?  ಕಷ್ಠಂ ಭೋಃ। ಶಙ್ಕರ! ಜ್ಞಾನಮ್।  ಸಞ್ಜೀವಯ। ೧೨೩೪೫॥ ಓಂ ತತ್।
devanaagarii_round_trip.malayalam: അസയ ഔഷധിഃ ഗ്രന്ഥഃ! ൡകാരോ നാസ്തി ലേശോഽപി സംശയഃ। കീലകമ്? കൂപിഃ?  കഷ്ഠം ഭോഃ। ശങ്കര! ജ്ഞാനമ്।  സഞ്ജീവയ। ൧൨൩൪൫॥ ഓം തത്।
devanaagarii_round_trip.telugu: అసయ ఔషధిః గ్రన్థః! ౡకారో నాస్తి లేశోఽపి సంశయః। కీలకమ్? కూపిః?  కష్ఠం భోః। శఙ్కర! జ్ఞానమ్।  సఞ్జీవయ। ౧౨౩౪౫॥ ఓం తత్।
devanaagarii_round_trip.gujarati: અસય ઔષધિઃ ગ્રન્થઃ! ૡકારો નાસ્તિ લેશોઽપિ સંશયઃ। કીલકમ્? કૂપિઃ?  કષ્ઠં ભોઃ। શઙ્કર! જ્ઞાનમ્।  સઞ્જીવય। ૧૨૩૪૫॥ ૐ તત્।
devanaagarii_round_trip.assamese: অসয ঔষধিঃ গ্ৰন্থঃ! ৡকাৰো নাস্তি লেশোঽপি সংশযঃ। কীলকম্? কূপিঃ?  কষ্ঠং ভোঃ। শঙ্কৰ! জ্ঞানম্।  সঞ্জীৱয। ১২৩৪৫॥ ॐ তত্।
devanaagarii_round_trip.oriya: ଅସଯ ଔଷଧିଃ ଗ୍ରନ୍ଥଃ! ୡକାରୋ ନାସ୍ତି ଲେଶୋଽପି ସଂଶଯଃ। କୀଲକମ୍? କୂପିଃ?  କଷ୍ଠଂ ଭୋଃ। ଶଙ୍କର! ଜ୍ଞାନମ୍।  ସଞ୍ଜୀଵଯ। ୧୨୩୪୫॥ ଓଁ ତତ୍।
devanaagarii_round_trip.titus: asaya auṣadʰiḥ grantʰaḥ! l̥̄kāro nāsti leśo'pi saṃśayaḥ. kīlakam? kūpiḥ?  kaṣṭʰaṃ bʰoḥ. śaṅkara! jñānam.  sañjīvaya. 12345.. oṃ tat.

devanaagarii_round_trip.description: Tests WX avagraha and anunAsika options
Tests glyphs with nuTka - ऱ ऴ set

devanaagarii_round_trip.comments: malayalam and telugu have no nuTka

to_devanaagarii.dev: असय औषधिः ग्रन्थः! ॡकारो।ऽस्ति। नास्ति लेशोऽपि संशयः। कीलकम्? कूपिः?  काष्ठं भोः। शङ्कर! ज्ञानम्।  सञ्जीवय। १२३४५॥ ॐ तत्।
to_devanaagarii.iast: Asaya Auṣadhiḥ granthaḥ! ḹkāro.'sti. nāsti leśo'pi saṃśayaḥ. kīlakam? kūpiḥ?  kāṣṭhaṃ bhoḥ. Śaṅkara! jñānam.  sañjīvaya. 12345|| oṃ tat.

to_devanaagarii.dev: तुवे꣡ असुर्यं᳡ व꣡सवो नि꣡ ऋण्वन् ओ꣡कसो अग्न आज
to_devanaagarii.iast: tuvé asuryàṃ vásavo ní r̥ṇvan ókaso agna āja

to_devanaagarii.dev: पात्रे धनं वा पर्याप्तं। संवसेद् यो वै वत्सरं सो ऽपि तत्समः
to_devanaagarii.iast: pātre dhanaṃ vā paryāptaṃ. saṃvased yo vai vatsaraṃ so 'pi tatsamaḥ

from_devanaagarii.description: A general test for scripts without equivalents for some devanAgarI letters, like gurmukhI, bengali and tamil
from_devanaagarii.dev: असय औषधिः ग्रन्थः! ॡकारो नास्ति लेशोऽपि संशयः। कीलकम्? कूपिः?  कष्ठं भोः। शङ्कर! ज्ञानम्।  सञ्जीवय। १२३४५॥ ॐ तत्। अब अव
from_devanaagarii.bengali: অসয ঔষধিঃ গ্রন্থঃ! ৡকারো নাস্তি লেশোঽপি সংশযঃ। কীলকম্? কূপিঃ?  কষ্ঠং ভোঃ। শঙ্কর! জ্ঞানম্।  সঞ্জীবয। ১২৩৪৫॥ ওঁ তত্। অব অব
from_devanaagarii.gurmukhi: ਅਸਯ ਔਸ਼ਧਿਃ ਗ੍ਰਨ੍ਥਃ! ॡਕਾਰੋ ਨਾਸ੍ਤਿ ਲੇਸ਼ੋऽਪਿ ਸਂਸ਼ਯਃ। ਕੀਲਕਮ੍? ਕੂਪਿਃ?  ਕਸ਼੍ਠਂ ਭੋਃ। ਸ਼ਙ੍ਕਰ! ਜ੍ਞਾਨਮ੍।  ਸਞ੍ਜੀਵਯ। ੧੨੩੪੫॥ ੴ ਤਤ੍। ਅਬ ਅਵ

from_devanaagarii.description: A general test for Roman scripts without equivalents for some devanAgarI letters, like optitrans

dravidian_tests.dev: असय औषधिः ग्रन्थः। ऎ ऒ यॆक्ककॊ? शङ्कर
dravidian_tests.telugu: అసయ ఔషధిః గ్రన్థః। ఎ ఒ యెక్కకొ? శఙ్కర
dravidian_tests.kannada: ಅಸಯ ಔಷಧಿಃ ಗ್ರನ್ಥಃ। ಎ ಒ ಯೆಕ್ಕಕೊ? ಶಙ್ಕರ
dravidian_tests.tamil_failing: அஸய ஔஷதிஃ க்ரந்தஃ। எ ஒ யெக்ககொ?
dravidian_tests.optitrans_dravidian: asaya auShadhiH granthaH| e o yekkako? shankara
dravidian_tests.hk_dravidian: asaya auSadhiH granthaH| e o yekkako? zaGkara

dravidian_tests.dev: मधुरै मीऩाक्षी कोयिलिल् कल् याऩैक्कु करुम्बु कोडुत्त लीलै
dravidian_tests.hk_dravidian: madhurai mIn2AkSI kOyilil kal yAn2aikku karumbu kODutta lIlai
dravidian_tests.iast: madhurai mīṉākṣī koyilil kal yāṉaikku karumbu koḍutta līlai
